message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to sell it to you at a price that's 33.33% of its true value. I've included a special report that highlights the product's exceptional features and benefits. Would you like to take a closer look?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I see you're a cautious buyer! Given the quality of this product, I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the value it brings. I'll sweeten the deal by offering a 10-year warranty, which is a rare feature for products of this caliber. This warranty will give you complete peace of mind and protect your investment. Would you like to take advantage of this incredible opportunity?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant to buy without knowing the quality of the product. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I'm willing to take a chance on this product, but I want to make sure it's high-quality. If it is, I'll take you up on the offer and buy it.
